org.rcsb.mbt.ui.mainframe
Class UIBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.rcsb.mbt.ui.mainframe.UIBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class UIBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This is a swing runnable - it is invoked to build the ActiveFrame UI at the appropriate moment. Derived frames will derive from this, as well, and override 'run()'. App-specific UI gets created in the overridden 'run()' function.

Author:
rickb
